vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G3508', 'matchingForm': 'Νεφθαλείμ', 'stepTransliteration': 'nefthaleim', 'gloss': 'Naphtali', '_searchResultRange': 'Matt.4.13-Rev.7.6@Gen.30.8-Rev.7.6', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '拿弗他利', '_es_Gloss': 'Neftalí', '_zh_Gloss': '拿弗他利'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5321H', 'matchingForm': 'נַפְתָּלִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'naph.ta.li', 'gloss': '-naphtali', '_searchResultRange': 'Judg.4.6@Josh.12.22-1Chr.6.76', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '拿弗他利', '_es_Gloss': 'Nephtalí', '_zh_Gloss': '拿弗他利'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Naphtali living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.8;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Bilhah (H1090A);
brother of: Dan (H1835H);
half-brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074), Dinah (H1783), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Jahzeel (H3183), Guni (H1476), Jezer (H3337) and Shillem (H8006)
Also named: Nephthaleim<\i> (Νεφθαλείμ "Naphtali" G3508)
§ Naphtali = "wrestling"
n pr m
1) the 5th son of Jacob and the 2nd by Bilhah the handmaid of Rachel
2) the tribe descended from Naphtali the son of Jacob
n pr loc
3) the territory assigned to the tribe of Naphtali
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jacob; fundador de una tribu de Israel
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿弗他利 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 「摔角」
陽性專有名詞
1) 雅各的第五個兒子, 拉結的使女辟拉所生的次子 ( 創 35:25| )
2) 雅各的兒子拿弗他利後裔的支派
專有名詞 地名
3) 拿弗他利所分得的地業
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拿弗他利 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 「摔角」
阳性专有名词
1) 雅各的第五个儿子, 拉结的使女辟拉所生的次子 ( 创 35:25| )
2) 雅各的儿子拿弗他利后裔的支派
专有名词 地名
3) 拿弗他利所分得的地业

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with qe.desh (קֶ֫דֶשׁ "Kedesh" H6943)
§ Naphtali = "wrestling"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the 5th son of Jacob and the 2nd by Bilhah the handmaid of Rachel
2) the tribe descended from Naphtali the son of Jacob
n pr loc
3) the territory assigned to the tribe of Naphtali
